Summary: black orb 1.5 - 2.5 ft dia. looked kind of distorted around the edges
trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Burbank

This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was leaving my apt to walk the dog. I stepped out the door and saw this black blurry orb hanging in the air. It wasnt moving when I noticed it but as I looked at it ,it moved 10 feet over from between the telephone pole to the tree, just a little below the top of the tree and paused for a second and went a quarter way around the tree, rose about 15-25 ft higher and went off north west. After it went around the tree i ran inside for my camera and snapped a shot..
